about_the_game:
Trapped in limbo. Toyed with for eternity. Escape, or lose your last chance at life.

In JumpCat, you find yourself imprisoned in a haunting limbo ruled by Sadie—a sinister girl with a twisted love for games. She’s trapped you in her dark playground, alongside the eerie residents she’s crafted to entertain her forever. Your only hope? Climb, jump, and outsmart her to reclaim your life. Fail, and you’ll remain her plaything for eternity.

Explore Sadie’s unsettling world, where every shadow holds a secret and every leap brings you closer—or pulls you deeper into despair. Meet her peculiar creations, unravel the truth behind their tragic existence, and search for hidden collectibles that might just hold the key to your freedom.

Key Features

  • Escape Sadie’s Eternal Trap: Outsmart a sinister child determined to keep you in her nightmarish limbo forever.

  • Unravel Dark Secrets: Meet haunting residents, uncover their origins, and piece together the story of Sadie’s twisted world.

  • Climb for Your Life: Navigate challenging vertical levels filled with traps, puzzles, and eerie surprises.

  • Discover and Collect: Search for hidden artifacts that reveal more about the world—and strengthen your chances of escape.

  • Solo or (lan) Multiplayer Escape: Face the terror alone, or team up with friends in a frantic race to freedom.

Reclaim your life before it’s too late! Play JumpCat—and jump for your salvation.

name: JumpCat

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 12 compatible graphics card (8GB VRAM)
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel® iCore™ i5-3570K or AMD® Ryzen™ 5 2400G
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 12 compatible graphics card. 12gb VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: Oh no you died! Luckily cats have nine lives. JumpCat is a game where you must climb to escape for another chance at life!
